name: vscode-jest-test-adapter
description: Run your Jest tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Tyler Benfield <rtbenfield@gmail.com>

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

jestTestExplorer.logpanel.description: Write diagnotic logs to an output panel.
jestTestExplorer.logpanel.title: Log Panel

jestTestExplorer.logfile.description: Write diagnostic logs to the given file.
jestTestExplorer.logfile.title: Log File

jestTestExplorer.pathToJest.description: Override the path to the Jest executable. The default behavior is to attempt to detect common configurations.

jestTestExplorer.pathToJestConfig.description: Override the path to the Jest config file. The default behavior is to attempt to detect common configurations.
